```{r}
meta_data_2019 <- read_csv("2019_vendor_invoice.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
clean_2019_data <- meta_data_2019 %>% 
  select(vendor, receipt_id, item, unit, date, cost_unit, total_quantity, total_cost) %>% 
  drop_na(item) %>% 
  group_by(vendor)
```
